channel.title: Rust on Jeongseup Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Jeongseup Blog

item.title: [Namada] Add Custom Queries for Validator Epoch Rewards
item.description:
Feature Description

Added custom RPC queries to extract on-chain data for validators and delegators. This feature specifically implements a query to retrieve the first block height by epoch, which is essential for calculating specific epoch rewards for validators.

View on GitHub

item.title: [Axelar] Update Vote Event Status
item.description:
Feature Description

Suggested and implemented an update to the verifier’s vote event to properly fire the vote status for a poll ID. This change improves the observability of the voting process within the Axelar Amplifier.

View on GitHub

item.title: [Namada] Add RPC Query for Validator Liveness
item.description:
Feature Description

Implemented a new RPC query function to check validators’ liveness (uptime). This feature allows validators to monitor their own performance and uptime directly through the RPC interface.

View on GitHub

item.title: [Namada] Add Wallet Convert CLI Command
item.description:
Feature Description

Added a new CLI command wallet convert to the namadaw tool. This command facilitates the conversion of Tendermint key JSON files, streamlining the key management process for validators and users.

View on GitHub

item.title: [Simperby] Implement Double Vote Checks in Vetomint
item.description:
Feature Description

Implemented check_double_prevote and check_double_precommit functions in the Vetomint consensus module. These checks are crucial for preventing double-voting misbehaviors, enhancing the security and stability of the consensus mechanism.

View on GitHub
